org.openmuc.jdlms

Annotation Type CosemClass


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface CosemClass

    The CosemClass annotation tells jDLMS stack that the annotated class is a COSEM class. 

     @CosemClass(id = 1, version = 0)
 public class Data extends CosemInterfaceObject {
      ...
 
      public Data(ObisCode instanceId) {
          super(instanceId)
      }
 
 }
    See Also:
    CosemMethod, CosemAttribute, CosemInterfaceObject

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      int id
      The COSEM class ID.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int version
      The version of the COSEM class.

    • Element Detail

      • id

        public abstract int id
        The COSEM class ID. Value greater than zero.
        Returns:
        the class ID.

      • version

        public abstract int version
        The version of the COSEM class.

        The version must be a positive integer.

        Returns:
        the version.
        Default:
        0
